name: Priest
description: A Priest is a Medium humanoid clad in robes, often carrying holy symbols. They are spiritual leaders capable of casting healing spells and wards.
memorable: Excels in spellcasting with high Wisdom, providing significant support through healing and blessings.
goals: To guide and protect their community through divine magic and teachings.
relations: Usually affiliated with religious orders or communities, they may work alongside acolytes or other compassionate beings.
environment: Typically found in temples, shrines, or in communities of worship.
strengths: High Wisdom enhances healing and spellcasting effectiveness.
weaknesses: Relatively low physical attack capabilities; relies more on spells than on melee combat.
attacks: Uses a mace for melee attacks, dealing bludgeoning damage enhanced with radiant or necrotic damage, or casts a divine bolt for ranged necrotic or radiant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Spirit guardians creates an aura of protection that damages foes and grants difficult terrain, serving as both offensive and defensive support.
equipment: Typically wields a mace and carries holy symbols.
senses: Passive perception of 13 indicates decent awareness of surroundings.
skills: Proficient in medicine, insight, and religion, leveraging their high Wisdom for valuable support.
additional_information: Can heal allies with spells like Healing Word
Resistance to necrotic or radiant damage based on their deity
Multiattack capability allows for consistent damage output
Utilizes spells to control battlefield and protect allies
Blends combat and healing abilities effectively
spellcasting: Functions as a 5th-level spellcaster, with spells focused on healing and utility, including Dispel Magic and Spirit Guardians.
test_queries: medium cleric who casts healing spells
